summary: THE RECLINING MECHIGNITION ON BOTH SEAT ARE MADE OF VERY CHEAP METAL, AND BOTH HAVE SNAPPED OFF AT THE SEAT ITSELF. ALSO YOU CAN BE DRIVING DOWN THE ROAD AND THE SEAT WILL SLIDE BACK AFTER RELEASING ITSELF FROM THE LOCKED POSITION. AND THE THIRD DOOR HANDLE IS PLASTIC AND BREAKS WHEN TRYING TO OPEN IT IN THE COLD WEATHER.
